TunnelInside Class

class TunnelInside

A class representing the inside of a tunnel.

quantifier

A factor used to determine the size of the tunnel inside.

__init__()

Initializes a TunnelInside.

render(window, coords, clip, coverage)

Renders the inside of the tunnel on the window.

Parameters:

  • window – The Pygame window surface.

  • coords – Coordinates of the tunnel.

  • clip – Clipping information for sprites.

  • coverage – List of coverage information.
